alert.note: Alert for Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...Very heavy showers will impact portions of central Wayne and northeastern Ontario Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking very heavy showers and isolated thunder along a line extending from near Sodus to near Clifton Springs to near Branchport. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Very heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Newark, Williamson, Marion, Lyons, Palmyra, Clifton Springs, Phelps, Sodus, Rushville, Chimney Bluffs State Park, Gorham, Manchester, Shortsville, Sodus Point, Seneca Lake State Park, East Williamson, Seneca Castle, and Pultneyville. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 42 and 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
